name: @triliumnext/electron
description: Desktop client for TriliumNext, embedding both the client and the server.

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--import tsx" TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=./data TRILIUM_ENV=dev electron ./src/electron-main.ts --inspect=5858 .
scripts.start-prod: npm run build:prepare-dist && npx electron-rebuild -m build && cross-env TRILIUM_DATA_DIR=./data TRILIUM_ENV=prod electron ./build/src/electron-main.js --inspect=5858 .
scripts.build:prepare-dist: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy-dist && npm run build:ts
scripts.electron-forge:start: npm run build:prepare-dist && cd ./build && electron-forge start
scripts.electron-forge:make: npm run build:prepare-dist && cross-env DEBUG=electron-windows-installer:* electron-forge make ./build
scripts.electron-forge:package: npm run build:prepare-dist && cd ./build && electron-forge package
